pages.text: While $(item)dirt/$ is relatively plentiful if you're willing to strip the other islands, you might still want to automate the creation of it.$(p)For this, simply follow these three easy steps:$(br)$(li)Craft $(item)coarse dirt/$.$(li)Place it down in-world.$(li)Till it with a $(item)hoe/$.$(p)              $(t:32x Coarse Dirt)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

Of course, this entire process can eventually be automated using Create's $(item)crafter/$, $(item)deployer/$, $(item)plough/$ and $(item)drill/$.$(p)Though this is left as an exercise for the reader.
